titles.title: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2006
A bill to establish the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2006 - Establishes the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in Illinois. Designates the Southern Illinois University Carbondale as the management entity for the Area.
